5 The MLWorks Motif Interface Library

5.4 Abstract types

The library uses the following abstract types:

Table 5.1 ML equality types and their C equivalents

ML equality type

Equivalent C type

display

Display*

screen

Screen*

widget

Widget

gc

GC

visual

Visual*

pixel

Pixel

font

Font

font_struct

XFontStruct*

font_list

XmFontList

compound_string

XmString

translations

XtTranslations

atom

Atom

drawable

Drawable

colormap

Colormap
